characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: IYANDEN PSYKER only. Once during the battle, at the start of a Fight phase, you can declare that this model will activate the Psytronome of Iyanden. If you do so, for the rest of that Fight phase the Attacks characteristics of all friendly IYANDEN WRAITH CONSTRUCT  units that are within 6" of this model are doubled. However, at the end of the Fight phase, each IYANDEN WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit that was affected by the Psytronome suffers D3 mortal wounds.
